text: Hon-Kawagoe Station (本川越駅, ほんかわごええき) is a railway station of Seibu in Kawagoe, Saitama Prefecture, Japan. This station is the neareset station of Koedo. == Adjacent stations == ;Seibu : Seibu Shinjuku Line ::Koedo limited express, Commuter express :::Sayamashi - Hon-Kawagoe ::Express, Semi Expless, Local :::Minami-Ōtsuka - Hon-Kawagoe == Related pages == * Kawagoeshi Station * Kawagoe Station == Other websites == * Hon-Kawagoe Station (Official Site) Category:Railway stations in Saitama Prefecture
title: Hon-Kawagoe Station
